posts.post_content:
Would sell for SOLD or would trade for OJ or Mayo of similar value.  Nice card, but card is short.  I believe that the MC qualifier means that the TPG has determined that this was a factory cut short card as opposed to chicanery.

Feel free to PM offers if interested.  Happy New Year to all.
